metadata.title: CVE-2019-14982 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Exiv2 before v0.27.2, there is an integer overflow vulnerability in theWebPImage::getHeaderOffset function in webpimage.cpp. It can lead to abuffer overflow vulnerability and a crash.

criterions.comment: exiv2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
